hero.title: Valheimbygg AS – Solid construction for businesses and homes
hero.subtitle:
We provide comprehensive construction, renovations, and installations — on time, reliable, and without unnecessary formalities.

The Valheimbygg AS team consists of qualified specialists, including a civil engineer with higher education and staff who completed a Norwegian technical school (Fagskoleingeniør). We have many years of experience delivering projects in Norway and Poland.

We focus on quality, transparency, and reliability at every stage of the investment.

offer.heading: Our services
offer.lead: We handle both smaller jobs and complete projects – from first site visit to final delivery.

systeme.title: Partition Systems
systeme.detailsIntro: We provide comprehensive work in modern lightweight partition systems, with a strong focus on suspended ceilings and partition walls. We use materials from reputable manufacturers and deliver projects in line with technical standards and architectural guidelines.
items: Suspended ceilings - Installation of suspended systems from Armstrong, Rockfon, Hunter Douglas, Rigips
Gypsum board (G-K) ceilings on steel or aluminum framing — with integration of lighting, ventilation, and other installations
Perforated (acoustic) ceilings — gypsum board or metal, ensuring acoustic control in offices, services, and public buildings
Wooden and panel ceilings — installation of aesthetic ceilings with natural or veneered finishes for higher-standard interiors
Gypsum board partitions on Rigips, Knauf, Norgips systems — including fire-rated, acoustic, and technical partitions
Glass partitions — installation in Moelven systems, with optional integration of sliding doors, technical fittings, and aluminum elements

montasje.title: Installation Services
montasje.short: Precise installation work in new and modernized buildings.
montasje.detailsIntro: We carry out precise installation work in both new and upgraded facilities. Every assignment is delivered according to project documentation, with high aesthetics and durable workmanship.
items: Installation of internal and external doors — wooden, steel, aluminum
Installation of balustrades — steel, glass, and wooden systems (interior and exterior)
Installation of ventilated façades and lightweight façade systems — composite, wood, or fiber-cement panels
Window installation — in masonry, timber structures, and façade systems
Kitchen installation — precise fitting to utilities and equipment

snekker.title: Carpentry Services
snekker.detailsIntro: We plan to introduce comprehensive carpentry services covering roof structures, timber installations, and finish work using solid and laminated wood.
items: Finishing in solid and laminated wood

betong.title: Concrete Structures
betong.detailsIntro: Planned expansion to reinforced concrete works — foundations, walls, slabs, stairs, and other elements in monolithic or prefabricated technology, in accordance with project documentation and technical requirements.

why.heading: Why choose Valheimbygg AS?
why.lead: At Valheimbygg AS we prioritize solidity, transparency, and professionalism at every stage. We deliver construction projects for private and commercial clients, combining Scandinavian standards with many years of experience from Norway and Poland.

items.experience: Experienced, qualified team — our staff includes civil engineers with higher education and technical specialists from Norwegian vocational schools (Fagskoleingeniør). We combine design knowledge with hands-on execution.
items.quality: Top quality of workmanship and materials — we use certified materials from reputable manufacturers (e.g., Rigips, Knauf, Armstrong, Rockfon, Moelven) and follow installation standards precisely.
items.onTime: Reliability and keeping agreements — we work with realistic schedules and full transparency throughout the project.
items.communication: Continuous contact and good communication — we keep you informed about progress and key decisions, and provide technical guidance.
items.details: Attention to detail — every project is handled individually with care and respect for architectural intent and investor expectations.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.name: Full name
contact.consent: I consent to processing my data to be contacted regarding my inquiry.
contact.sent: Thank you! We'll get back to you shortly.
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email biuro@nordbud.pl.

cookies.title: Wallpro respects your privacy
cookies.lead: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, show personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept all", you consent to our use of cookies.
cookies.prefsText: We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You can find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below. Cookies categorized as "Necessary" are stored in your browser as they are essential to enable the basic functions of the site.
cookies.necessaryDesc: Necessary cookies are essential for the basic functionality of the website, and the website cannot function properly without them. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data.
cookies.functionalDesc: Functional cookies help perform certain functions such as sharing content on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third‑party features.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics such as number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc.
cookies.performanceDesc: Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps deliver a better user experience for visitors.
cookies.adsDesc: Advertising cookies are used to provide visitors with customized advertisements based on the pages you visited before and to analyze the effectiveness of ad campaigns.
cookies.unclassifiedDesc: Other unclassified cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category yet.
